title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.2 - Exceptions
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 205.2 - Exceptions

State Regulations

Bicycles may not be operated on the roadway deck of the

Newburgh-Beacon and Mid-Hudson Bridges. Bicycles may be operated on the

Walkway/Bikeway paths of the Newburgh-Beacon and Mid-Hudson Bridges subject to
the regulations posted prominently thereon. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
205.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
